name: Garchomp
description: When it folds up its body and extends its wings, it looks like a jet plane. It flies at sonic speed.

abilities.name: Sand Veil
abilities.effect: During a sandstorm, this Pokémon has 1.25× its evasion, and it does not take sandstorm damage regardless of type.  The evasion bonus does not count as a stat modifier.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, the wild encounter rate is halved in a sandstorm.

abilities.name: Rough Skin
abilities.effect: Whenever a move makes contact with this Pokémon, the move's user takes 1/8 of its maximum HP in damage.  This ability functions identically to iron barbs.
